question:
Which among the following acts was/ were passed during the viceroyship of John Lawrence?
1. Punjab Tenancy Act
2. Bengal Tenancy Act
3. Oudh Tenancy Act
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Punjab Tenancy Act and Oudh Tenancy Act were passed in the year 1868. As per the Punjab Tenancy Act, tenants received some occupancy right over certain cases. It is also known as “bulwark and a charter of a contented peasantry.” As per the Oudh Tenancy Act, the occupancy right was given to 1/5th of the total no of riots.
